perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item0.name: Goredrinker
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item1.name: Broken Stopwatch
item1.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item3.name: Black Cleaver
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
300 Health
25 Ability Haste
  • Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 4% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 24% Armor reduction).
  • Butcher: Damaging Abilities and Attacks ( On-Hit) against fully Carved enemies deal an additional 5% missing Health physical damage.

    Damage over time effects deal 40% Butcher damage (0.5s cooldown).

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Chempunk Chainsword
item5.description:
45 Attack Damage
150 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Broken Stopwatch
item0.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item1.name: Edge of Night
item1.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item2.name: Serylda's Grudge
item2.description:
45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration
20 Ability Haste
  • Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

item3.name: Umbral Glaive
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
12 Lethality
15 Ability Haste
  • Blackout: When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you for 8 seconds (45s cooldown). Your Attacks instantly kill revealed traps and do triple damage to Wards.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
item5.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
20 Ability Haste
  • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

400 Health

150% Base Health Regen

item1.name: Black Cleaver
item1.description:
40 Attack Damage
300 Health
25 Ability Haste
  • Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 4% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 24% Armor reduction).
  • Butcher: Damaging Abilities and Attacks ( On-Hit) against fully Carved enemies deal an additional 5% missing Health physical damage.

    Damage over time effects deal 40% Butcher damage (0.5s cooldown).

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Chempunk Chainsword
item3.description:
45 Attack Damage
150 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item4.name: Mercury's Treads
item4.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item5.name: Stopwatch
item5.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Eclipse
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Serylda's Grudge
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration
20 Ability Haste
  • Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Edge of Night
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item4.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
item4.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
20 Ability Haste
  • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.
